long_description: The MSR Alpine Teapot features a wide mouth for easy cooking and cleaning, and a convenient pour spout; can nest in a 1.5-liter pot for easy packing. Corrosion-resistant stainless steel stays cool to the touch and is sturdy for rugged conditions. Lid with handle helps speed up boil times. Dual, fold-down bail wire handles provide stable and easy handling and pouring. Volume graduations imprinted on sides for measuring.
short_description: The MSR Alpine Teapot features a wide mouth for easy cooking and cleaning, and a convenient pour spout; can nest in a 1.5-liter pot for easy packing.
